message.content: {"steps":[{"output":"Step 1 [Understanding the problem]:","explanation":"We need to find the maximum value of the probability \\( P(t^2 - t + 1 \\leq X \\leq t^2 + t + 1) \\) where \\( X \\sim N(1, t^2) \\) and \\( t \\) satisfies \\( P(X \\leq 5t) \\geq \\frac{1}{2} \\)."},{"output":"Step 2 [Standardizing the normal variable]:","explanation":"Since \\( X \\sim N(1, t^2) \\), we can standardize \\( X \\) using the transformation \\( Z = \\frac{X - 1}{t} \\), where \\( Z \\sim N(0, 1) \\)."},{"output":"Step 3 [Expressing the probability condition]:","explanation":"The condition \\( P(X \\leq 5t) \\geq \\frac{1}{2} \\) becomes \\( P\\left(\\frac{X - 1}{t} \\leq \\frac{5t - 1}{t}\\right) \\geq \\frac{1}{2} \\). This implies \\( P\\left(Z \\leq 5 - \\frac{1}{t}\\right) \\geq \\frac{1}{2} \\)."},{"output":"Step 4 [Using the properties of the standard normal distribution]:","explanation":"Since \\( P(Z \\leq 0) = \\frac{1}{2} \\), we have \\( 5 - \\frac{1}{t} \\geq 0 \\). Thus, \\( t \\geq \\frac{1}{5} \\)."},{"output":"Step 5 [Finding the probability expression]:","explanation":"We need to find \\( P(t^2 - t + 1 \\leq X \\leq t^2 + t + 1) \\). Standardizing, this becomes \\( P\\left(\\frac{t^2 - t + 1 - 1}{t} \\leq Z \\leq \\frac{t^2 + t + 1 - 1}{t}\\right) \\)."},{"output":"Step 6 [Simplifying the probability expression]:","explanation":"This simplifies to \\( P\\left(\\frac{t^2 - t}{t} \\leq Z \\leq \\frac{t^2 + t}{t}\\right) = P(t - 1 \\leq Z \\leq t + 1) \\)."},{"output":"Step 7 [Maximizing the probability]:","explanation":"The probability \\( P(t - 1 \\leq Z \\leq t + 1) \\) is maximized when the interval \\([t - 1, t + 1]\\) is symmetric around 0, which occurs when \\( t = 0 \\). However, \\( t \\geq \\frac{1}{5} \\)."},{"output":"Step 8 [Evaluating the probability at the boundary]:","explanation":"For \\( t = \\frac{1}{5} \\), the interval becomes \\([-\\frac{4}{5}, \\frac{6}{5}]\\). The probability is \\( P(-0.8 \\leq Z \\leq 1.2) \\)."},{"output":"Step 9 [Calculating the probability]:","explanation":"Using standard normal distribution tables or a calculator, \\( P(-0.8 \\leq Z \\leq 1.2) = \\Phi(1.2) - \\Phi(-0.8) \\approx 0.8849 - 0.2119 = 0.6730 \\)."},{"output":"Step 10 [Conclusion]:","explanation":"The maximum value of the probability \\( P(t^2 - t + 1 \\leq X \\leq t^2 + t + 1) \\) is approximately 0.6730."}],"final_answer":"\\boxed{0.6730}"}
